attributes.action: Order the reinstatement of teacher Bob MacKenzie.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Teacher Bob Mackenzie was forced to resign his job after a disciplinary investigation following his clipping around the ear of an unruly foul-mouthed 15 year old male pupil.
Such minor acts of corporal punishment do neither physical nor psychological damage to the recipient and should not result in disciplinary or legal action being taken against our teaching staff.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
